thread.title: Snapchat of Muslim teacher escorted off US-bound plane
thread.title_full: Snapchat of Muslim teacher escorted off US-bound plane

title: Snapchat of Muslim teacher escorted off US-bound plane
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Snapchat of Muslim teacher escorted off US-bound plane 21 February 2017 Last updated at 14:04 GMT 
A Muslim teacher denied entry to the United States while on a school trip said he has still not been told why. 
Juhel Miah, 25, had flown to Reykjavik, Iceland, with the party from Llangatwg Community School in Aberdulais, Neath, before boarding an onward flight to New York on 16 February. 
But before the plane took off, he was escorted off by security staff. 
Mr Miah posted a video of him being escorted off the plane on Snapchat. Read more
